page.title: 10Why I like Bakewell
page.content: Bakewell is a very nice place to live in. There are beautiful flowers in {Bath Gardens, }and I see the gardener there every day of the week, looking after the flowers, watering them and sometimes planting new ones. Best of all I like the{fair,}but it only comes once a year. At the fair this year there was a new ride called the orbiter, but I didn't go on that because it went too fast. This year I went on the cyclone, the skid and the barrels of fun. In Bakewell every year there are {Well Dressings,} and this year the{ {2nd Bakewell Brownies}did a picture of the children in Ethiopia who are starving because of a terrible drout and famine.
